content.label:
I think I would love this game if it didn’t freeze at almost every move. This is a known issue for iPad Air 2 acknowledged by Aspyr back in January of 2020, but they haven’t fixed it. 

Game is essentially unplayable.

Update two months later. Play on iPad has deteriorated so much that it is unplayable. Freezes during every move, sometimes freezes the minute the game starts.

Rating continually decreasing the longer we wait for a fix. There is a known issue with the game freezing while running on iPad Air 2. The game is unplayable. This has been an issue for months. Do not pay for this game until they fix this issue. It has been reported and acknowledged with no progress made towards solving the issue.

The game is great and I love the new update but it is unplayable due to constant crashing. I have a iPad Air 2 and this listed as a supported device. I have a ton of available space, if this issues not fixed the game is useless. Many people seem to have the same issue please fix this problem.

title.label: Love the Civ games, but buggy!!

content.label:
I have loved every Civ game since the first, but this one has gotten buggy. 

A recent update basically hangs the game after a few turns making it unplayable.

For the last 4 months what was once my absolutely favorite game, has become unplayable.  When they created their last expansion pack they apparently created a bug that causes the game to freeze at almost every turn.  Do not waste your money, unless you read that this bug has been fixed. **UPDATE** They released an update on 10/22/2020 that apparently didn’t go to ipad.  The game would be awesome...if you could actually play it.  So disappointed.

I love the civ games and play on pc and console as well. After reading some of the other reviews I was hopeful that the bugs were fixed and decided to buy the app. After 20-30 turns the game began freezing up every other turn causing me to close and reopen the app. I still haven’t made it through 40 turns and the game is freezing before I can even finish another turn. I now spend more time loading in than actually playing. For the amount you spend on the basic game you shouldn’t have these problems this early on if at all. I would consider buying the expansions if the game didn’t have these issues. Hopefully there is some resolution in the near future so I can continue to conquer the world.

title.label: Amazing game, and a great iPad port

content.label:
It’s incredible that they managed to bring the full game to iPad, and the controls work really well in this platform. I also own the full game + DLCs on Steam, but sometimes prefer to play on my iPad just for the added convenience and portability.

My only gripe is that map pins become a bit of a hassle in this iPad version if you’re the type of player that makes heavy use of them. You can’t zoom out that much, and it ends up taking a lot of screen real estate. I wish there was a toggle to show/hide map pins.

Since adding this expansion no achievements can be unlocked including the other expansions and the original. This problem is common online and the developer blames users even after over a year of complaints
It is a good game but it did reset me and all my work
I can’t get past the splash screen on iPad Air (MD786LL/A) with sw 12.4.8. Works fine on my iPhone SE 2020.

Unplayable these days on Ipad Air 2, constantly freezes, can rarely even make it through a single turn.  Aspyr acknowledged almost a year ago that there were issues but they have done nothing to fix them and apparently don’t plan to.  Incredibly frustrating for an app that costs this much to be so low quality.  Don’t waste your money.
I downloaded gathering storm and it won’t download on my iPhone 11
This game is so bad.. you have to pay 10 dollars just to play the whole game and if you wanted to play 60 turns for free. You literally had to use your Apple password... just terrible
This is easily my favorite mobile game.  It would be perfect if we were able to increase the resolution on more powerful modern iOS devices.
Save your money - game crashes constantly starting around turn 150.  I’ve tried smaller maps, fewer opponents, etc, nothing has worked.
Absolutely love this, where is the update!lol....thank you, favoritisms gam awesome experience.
I love this game and is amazing to have on my iPad. However as you get to latter stages and start using advanced units (jet bombers, nukes, etc...), game always crashes

Most notable bug, on my iPad Pro 11 the bomber animation with a nuke or without will 9 times out of 10 freeze the whole screen and makes me force quit. Losing the last turn. Other little bugs here and there like the button to attack from cities is jacked up and takes like 4 tries to get it to register. Overall game is ok without these bugs.

Can’t do much with this game anymore. It crashes before I can do anything in the game.  Even when it works, it’s a cpu hog and kills the battery of my iPad very quickly. The game itself is fun but the crashes take all the fun out of it.

I love the game to death, but on my iPad mini 4 I have had nothing but crashes. I feel very lucky to play more than 5 minutes. I finally had to give up. I wish someone could tell me why this keeps happening or could install an update fix or patch. Ty.
I love the game on pc, bought it on iOS and can’t even play the game won’t load plz fix

This is a great game!!! It's very similar to the PC version, almost identical. I have absolutely no complaints at all. No idea why it has such a bad rating. I guess people don't want to pay good money for good quality.

No update in 10, 11 months? Other platforms are getting an insane amount of updates, like the New Frontier Pass, which is giving other platforms an entire content roadmap from 2020-2021.

I am happy we have this on our mobile devices, but come on, if you’re going to charge premium prices you need to value your customers a little more than this.

Please show the iOS port some love.

BUYERS BEWARE. Absolute waste of money. I just recently bought the gathering storm dlc and not only will it not download but the game keeps insisting I re-purchase it in order to download it at each restart of the app when the charge is already confirmed and deducted from my account. Never had this problem with another app. Do not buy.
We meed CIV V mobile please!!

I have downloaded the game on my phone (iPhone 11 Pro) and the game runs perfectly, no delay or freezing. But then I downloaded in my iPad Air 2 and the game freeze once I start playing. Image doesn’t move but the audio still going.
THIS GAME IS FUN AND ADDICTIVE. I ONLY ASK FOR THE CREATORS TO MAKE THE GAME EXACTLY LIKE IT IS ON THE SYSTEMS LIKE MORE CIVS LEADERS AND EASY TO FIND OPEN MULTIPLAYER GAMES
It was so amazing, you could even play it on Mobile and I was really happy that they included that, also the art is just absolutely great, they got everything right
Don’t buy this if running on a Mac. Developer seems not interested in issuing a fix

This app keeps crashing.  And now it shuts down my phone.  My phone also get very hot while on the app.  I want my money back.  I have been a big fan of CIV since it first came out.  I was so glad it is now on this platform, but now I am so frustrated.  Also the expansion pack are way too expensive. So I won’t be getting anymore.

I’m getting tired of half way through a game it is still crashing.  Bomber attacking a city.  Please fix this or I want my money back.  This is ridiculous.

I enjoy the game, feels like the same on steam, would like the UI to be a little smaller since i have an iPad 12.9 and playing with an apple pen and still unable to reach some u it’s behind the cities name.  Overall seems good.
Great game, they always seem to ruin it for weeks at a time on this port with crashes

title.label: Aspyr support doesn’t respond to support request.

content.label: Before getting the expansions I was playing the full version of the base game. I upgraded with rise and fall and gathering storm during the sale and the base game broke. My apps list still shows that I own the game. But when I start the game it asks me for $19.99. I followed the recommended solutions and had no success. I reached out to aspyr back in September 2020, I sent them pics, still waiting for support. I informed apple. Just cookie cutter responses. No one reads emails. Zero stars.

I love the game it’s so fun playing as Alexander of macedon trying to take over the map or playing as Poland going for a cultural win there so many way so play and win the alone thing I would like is a online multiplayer

title.label: Great Game BUT don’t buy it until they update it!!!

content.label: I’ve played Civ since its introduction in 1991. LOVED Civ 6 on iPad until the IOS 14 update. Now the game freezes constantly. DO NOT buy it until/unless they update it. The last update was 10 months ago...
FUN!

title.label: Love the game but too many game ending crashes

content.label: I love the game but they refuse to fix even the most basic bugs. The game freezes all the time making it unplayable.
It takes up a lot of storage

title.label: Good version but there are bugs

content.label: Love this version of Civ.  I’m running it on a less than one year old iPad Pro and find that it my screen will freeze 100% of the time when a bomber unit makes an attack run.  Game keeps playing in the background (I can hear it) but screen is frozen (though pressing buttons still makes a sound.
I have this game on my PC with no issues. The same game in vanilla crashes continually. It could 13 turns or 2 turns - no pattern have not been able to get game past 123 turns.

title.label: Phenomenal game and an amazing port!

content.label: I can’t rave enough about this game, and I bought it when it came out at full price, $60.  Ive never paid anywhere near that much on an iPad game in my life, but I’ve been a Civ nerd since Civ 2 and after playing the free trial I was hooked. I’ve purchased all of the expansions thus far released and I have probably played 30 or so standard, large and huge map games and still have a blast.  There are so many ways to attain victory, no two games are the same. I can’t endorse this game enough. Just get it. The only complaint I have is that the UI gets a little crowded sometimes, and it’s especially hard to long press a tile to see the info on it, like what district improvements are there.  It pops out the tooltip below and to the right, but it’s so long that it’s often below the viewable part of the screen, so I have to put the tile I want to look at in the very top of the screen.  But that’s a minor thing, overall an excellent game. Plus I wish they could figure out a way to do multiplayer games online.
Want my money back, the game crashes within 10 moves every time as many others have noted

It’s an excellent game while it doesn’t crash... I’m playing in a new iPad Pro (2020) and the game crash a lot!!!!
Want my money back!!!!
Unplayable on iOS14

For quite an expensive game, it now crashes randomly, when it did work, the scouts and ships exploring would open new lands only for them to be covered soon after.

I have many other Sid M games that all have some AI or other issues, they are great games but the quality control has vaporised.

Can’t recommend buying any 2K/SM games with such issues.

Great game, if you don’t have an expansion, it gets boring after a while. however, i just don’t get it that this game is not retina by default on my iPad 12,9.... it is impossible to add this feature on game settings.
I can’t even complete the tutorial before it freezes.

Absolute waste of money.  Buy Civ Revolution for a fraction of the price, it’s the same game.  Better graphics than Revolution, but other than that, it adds nothing.  Or buy Total War Rome, even better.  What a ripoff this was.
Love this game but when I try to download expansions nothing happens. It just sits at 0% I even refunded a 30$ purchase because it refused to download.

They are unable to keep up with iOS updates and game no longer works. Mine freezes every time I try and use a bomber. Bomber just flies to the space and the game freeze. Have to force close the game EVERY time. So sad.....
